parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The field that you use to sort the query results. Valid value:

*   regionCount: the number of regions.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the query results. Valid value:

*   ASC: in ascending order
*   DESC: in descending order
